Complete Independence

Dhangadeva was the first fully independent ruler of the Chandela dynasty. He completely severed ties with the Pratiharas and assumed the title 'Maharajadhiraja'. He formed an alliance with Jayapala, the king of Bhatinda, against Subuktigin (Ghaznavi).

ЁЯХЙя╕П
Kandariya Mahadeva

The most famous temples of Khajuraho - the Vishvanatha Temple and the Parshvanatha Temple - were built during his reign. Some historians believe he also initiated the construction of the Kandariya Mahadeva Temple. He took Jal Samadhi (water immolation) at Prayaga at the age of 100.
